name: conteneur
description: Lightweight and efficient TypeScript IoC container.

scripts.publish:pre: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run cover
scripts.release:prerelease: npm run publish:pre && npm version prerelease && npm run publish:post
scripts.release:patch: npm run publish:pre && npm version patch && npm run publish:post
scripts.release:minor: npm run publish:pre && npm version minor && npm run publish:post
scripts.release:major: npm run publish:pre && npm version major && npm run publish:post
